qas.question: What are polytechnics called in South Africa?
What year did Technikons gain the ability to give out technology degrees?

context: South Africa has completed a process of transforming its "higher education landscape". Historically a division has existed in South Africa between Universities and <a0_0>Technikons<a0_0/> (polytechnics) as well between institutions servicing particular racial and language groupings. In <a1_0>1993<a1_0/> Technikons were afforded the power to award certain technology degrees.
